dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 249 : To redesignate certain facilities at Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park in honor of Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate certain facilities at Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park in honor of Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr.

section.header: Redesignation of Paterson Great Falls NHP facilities

subsection.header: Great Falls Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge
subsection.text: Great Falls Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge at Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park shall hereafter be known and designated as Bill Pascrell, Jr. Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge.
Overlook Park at Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park shall hereafter be known and designated as Bill Pascrell, Jr. Overlook Park.
Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States toâ€”

paragraph.text: Great Falls Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge shall be deemed to be a reference to Bill Pascrell, Jr. Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge; and
Overlook Park shall be deemed to be a reference to Bill Pascrell, Jr. Overlook Park.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives May 13, 2025.
